result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for fetching and handling exchange rate prices from external APIs.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to exchange rates in separate files for client interactions and data models.

internal/infras/exchangerate/client.go.purpose: This file defines a client for fetching token prices from an external API.
side_effects: Makes HTTP requests to an external API
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive data in error responses
Improper handling of HTTP errors may lead to application crashes

internal/infras/exchangerate/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling exchange rate prices.
